bibl.title: Three Thêtas in the "Empédocle de Strasbourg".
bibl.note: Written version of remarks made at Leiden, 9 June 1999, in the course of a panel discussion. - The thêtas in P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)] are simply wrong. The slightly bizarre interpretation based on them may be abandoned.
ALGRA Keimpe and Jaap MANSFELD, Three Thêtas in the "Empédocle de Strasbourg".
